text: Odd Syversen (born 5 February 1945) is a Norwegian ice hockey player. He was born in Oslo, Norway and represented the club Vålerengens IF. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in Grenoble in 1968. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Odd Syversen
